Title: Requires the commissioner of labor to develop instructional tools and materials for industries at high-risk for occupational tick exposures
Summary: Requires the commissioner of labor, in consultation with the commissioner of health and the commissioner of environmental conservation, to develop instructional tools and materials for industries at high-risk for occupational tick exposures; requires such materials to provide information on the identification of ticks and tick removal, and protection from tick bites; requires such materials to be available to high-risk employers and employees at no charge.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the labor law, in relation to requiring the commissioner of labor to develop instructional tools and materials for industries at high-risk for occupational tick exposures
